mapper.update: update user set id=#{id}, email=#{email}, password=#{password}, nickname=#{nickname}, image=#{image} where no=#{no};
mapper.select: select no, id, email, nickname, image from user;
select no, id, email, nickname, image from user where no NOT IN (select b.u_no as no from groups a, groupuser b where a.no = b.g_no and a.no=#{no});
select c.no as no, c.id as id, c.email as email, c.nickname as nickname, c.image as image from groups a, groupuser b, user c where a.no = b.g_no and b.u_no = c.no and a.no=#{no};
select id from user where no = #{no};

select no, id, email, nickname, image from user where id =
#{ item.user_id }

select a.no as gNo, c.no as no, c.nickname as nickname, c.image as image from (select g.no as no, g.name from groups g, groupuser gu, user u where g.no = gu.g_no and gu.u_no = u.no and u.no = #{no}) a, groupuser b, user c where a.no = b.g_no and b.u_no = c.no;
